name: Dream of Ar-card-ia ~ Dreaming of the Perfect Deck
name_original: Dream of Ar-card-ia ~ Dreaming of the Perfect Deck
description: Enter the Dream World as Maribel Hearn and fend of nightmare beasts with the assistance of Doremy Sweet! A roguelike card game created for Touhou Fan Jam 8 composed of 7 stages. Collect more cards for your deck throughout your run, including the ability to recruit dream versions of 11 different Touhou characters as cards in your deck!
